## How It Works

1. **Search by function** - Describe what you want to do
2. **Browse quality scores** - See tests, documentation, maintenance status
3. **Read real reviews** - Learn from other users' experiences
4. **Find the right package** - Install with confidence

// Allow Enter key to search
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('package-search');
  if (searchInput) {
    searchInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
      if (e.key === 'Enter') {
        searchPackages();
      }
    });
  }
});
</script>
